item.description:
Join Nancy, myself and a few friends at Maynard's local theater company for their production of Escanaba in da Moonlight. We have seen a few shows there and its always a treat!

We will meet in the theater at 7:30 so we get good seats for the show at 8. Regular admission is $17, call to make a reservation.

http://www.acmetheate...

Reservations can be made by calling the Ticket Hotline at 978-823-0003 and following the prompts. All reservations are confirmed with a return phone call.
Phone reservations will be held at the door until 10 minutes of curtain and can be paid for with cash or check.



Escanaba in da Moonlight
By Jeff Daniels
Directed by Dave Sheppard
A hilariously twisted yarn about the Soady men and their escapades at a ramshackle deer camp just before Opening Day of hunting season. Four generations of Soadys have used their little "home away from home" to drink, cause a bit of trouble, and bag bucks. But 45-year old Rueben Soady has never shot a buck. Ruebenâ€™s attempts to change his luck instead unleash a series of strange incidents involving UFOs, visions, and other-worldly spirits.
item.name: commedy PLAY "Escanaba in da Moonlight" at Maynard's Acme Theater
